sentence: As a result, Tim Hutchison was exposed to Grizzards unique humor and perspective, which introduced him to the greatest college football player of the day, Herschel Walker.
author: Chip Towers
title: From far and wide, Georgia fans flock to Indianapolis

sentence: The Bulldogs hadn't won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.
title: Georgia Bulldogs win first national title since 1980

sentence: And some worry that Trump's picks, like former football star Herschel Walker in Georgia, could prove too controversial to prevail against Democrats in November, imperiling their bid for Senate control.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Ohio Senate primary a test of Trump's grip on Republican voters
